about_the_game:
It's Spooky Season!

A chill lingers in the air. It’s that mystical time of year, where the veil between the possible and impossible thins. The stage is set, everything appears to be in place, yet something feels off. Halloween isn’t unfolding as it should this year. Why? It’s up to Perry the Pumpkin to uncover the mystery!

But wait, who exactly is Perry the Pumpkin? You’re in the perfect place to find out.

In this thrilling platformer, you step into the shoes (or rather, the vines) of Perry the Pumpkin. Each area you explore unravels more secrets behind the chaos plaguing the spookiest night of the year. As you advance, Perry gains new abilities and discovers magical items. The world is brimming with power-ups, transforming your journey from a simple stroll to a magical flight on a broomstick.

Special Features

  • Play as Perry the Pumpkin: What's cooler than that?

  • Need more evidence: Perry attacks by spitting pumpkin seeds at enemies.

  • There are a variety of items and power-ups that can be collected.

  • Explore the different and meet unique characters.

  • Everything is basically themed around Halloween! Awesome!

  • Uncover mysteries and complete tasks for your new friends.

  • Entirely created and conceived by a son and his father.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compliant Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Basic sound card
  • Additional Notes: Should run fine with these requirements
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10 or greater
  • Processor: 64bit Intel Compatible Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Basic Sound Card

short_description: Perry, who happens to be a pumpkin, is on a quest to collect various magical items for Welda the Witch. Welda needs these to help thwart an unknown threat. On his way, Perry will encounter various challenges including evil skeletons, ghosts, and ghouls. Will you help Perry complete his mission?
